Building a Climate-Resilient Future

About CliMit

CliMit was founded in 2021 by Rutgers University undergraduate Michael Panchery, and is composed solely of Rutgers students.

Mission Statement

Storms are only growing stronger and more frequent as infrastructure weakens and lives are lost. Society must adjust, and while there are many individuals determined to solve climate change, we at CliMit are working to live with it. CliMit seeks to leverage new technologies with innovative ideas that will build safer, more resilient communities against climate-induced disasters. The sustainability and welfare of future generations is our utmost priority.

Areas of Focus


Floods

Wildfires

Droughts

Landslides
